ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We are grateful to several field and laboratory assistants: J. Braun-Wimmer, A. Bueno, S. Giese, J. Grossmann, M. Harrhy, E. Koertels, J. Rabenschlag, A. Vorl√§nder, and A. Wiegelmann. Thanks also to N. Ukrainetz and V. Berger from the B.C. Ministry of Forests, Lands, Natural Resource Operations and Rural Development (FLNRORD) for site information. We are grateful to FLNRORD for establishing and maintaining valuable field trials and for allowing site access. Funding was provided by NSERC (STPGP-430183, STPGP-494071, CGS-D), DFG (SP 437/18-1), Alexander von Humboldt Foundation (Feodor Lynen Research Fellowship), and Alberta Innovates Technology Futures (Graduate Scholarship).
